question: Lily has 12 jars of chocolate chips in her storage room. Each jar of chocolate chips can decorate 19 muffins. Lily wants to bake enough muffins to use up all of her chocolate chips. If each rack holds 12 muffins, how many racks worth of muffins should she bake?
answer:
She has enough chocolate chips for 12 * 19 = <<12*19=228>>228 muffins.
She needs 228 / 12 = <<228/12=19>>19 racks to bake all of the muffins.
#### 19
